posts.post_content: Pied 150 back, card has razor sharp corners (8's), well centered left to right. Top to bottom centering is off towards the bottom (all lettering intact). This is as nice a 5 as you will ever see. Probably a PSA 8(oc) or 7(oc) if crossed to them, $365 delivered. Please send me email for scans...thanks**SOLD**
